title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Pets              Pets       While visiting Pipe Spring National Monument you may take your pet with you as long as it is on a leash.  Please remain on the sidewalks with your pet. Pets are not allowed in the historic buildings or on the Ridge Trail. Please be prepared to pick up after your pet; trash cans can be found throughout the monument.
